@@ -10,4 +10,28 @@
     return render(request, 'home/favoris.html', {
         'favorites': favorites
     })
 
+@login_required
+def toggle_favorite(request, product_id):
+    try:
+        product = Product.objects.get(id=product_id)
+        favorite, created = Favorite.objects.get_or_create(
+            user=request.user,
+            product=product
+        )
+        
+        if not created:
+            favorite.delete()
+            is_favorite = False
+        else:
+            is_favorite = True
+            
+        return JsonResponse({
+            'status': 'success',
+            'is_favorite': is_favorite
+        })
+    except Product.DoesNotExist:
+        return JsonResponse({
+            'status': 'error',
+            'message': 'Product not found'
+        }, status=404)
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+from django.shortcuts import get_object_or_404, render
+from e_commerce.models import Product,Favorite
+from django.contrib.auth.decorators import login_required
+from django.http import JsonResponse
+from django.shortcuts import render
+
+@login_required
+def favorite_list(request):
+    favorites = Favorite.objects.filter(user=request.user).select_related('product')
+    return render(request, 'home/favoris.html', {
+        'favorites': favorites
+    })
+
+@login_required
+def toggle_favorite(request, product_id):
+    try:
+        product = Product.objects.get(id=product_id)
+        favorite, created = Favorite.objects.get_or_create(
+            user=request.user,
+            product=product
+        )
+        
+        if not created:
+            # If favorite exists, remove it
+            favorite.delete()
+            is_favorite = False
+        else:
+            is_favorite = True
+            
+        return JsonResponse({
+            'status': 'success',
+            'is_favorite': is_favorite,
+            'message': 'Produit ajouté aux favoris' if is_favorite else 'Produit retiré des favoris'
+        })
+        
+    except Product.DoesNotExist:
+        return JsonResponse({
+            'status': 'error',
+            'message': 'Produit non trouvé'
+        }, status=404)
+    except Exception as e:
+        return JsonResponse({
+            'status': 'error',
+            'message': str(e)
+        }, status=500)
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,44 @@
+from django.shortcuts import get_object_or_404, render
+from e_commerce.models import Product,Favorite
+from django.contrib.auth.decorators import login_required
+from django.http import JsonResponse
+from django.shortcuts import render
+
+@login_required
+def favorite_list(request):
+    favorites = Favorite.objects.filter(user=request.user).select_related('product')
+    return render(request, 'home/favoris.html', {
+        'favorites': favorites
+    })
+
+@login_required
+def toggle_favorite(request, product_id):
+    try:
+        product = Product.objects.get(id=product_id)
+        favorite, created = Favorite.objects.get_or_create(
+            user=request.user,
+            product=product
+        )
+        
+        if not created:
+            favorite.delete()
+            is_favorite = False
+        else:
+            is_favorite = True
+            
+        return JsonResponse({
+            'status': 'success',
+            'is_favorite': is_favorite,
+            # 'message': 'Produit ajouté aux favoris' if is_favorite else 'Produit retiré des favoris'
+        })
+        
+    except Product.DoesNotExist:
+        return JsonResponse({
+            'status': 'error',
+            'message': 'Produit non trouvé'
+        }, status=404)
+    except Exception as e:
+        return JsonResponse({
+            'status': 'error',
+            'message': str(e)
+        }, status=500)
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -6,8 +6,20 @@
 
 @login_required
 def favorite_list(request):
     favorites = Favorite.objects.filter(user=request.user).select_related('product')
+     # Vérifier si l'utilisateur est authentifié
+    if request.user.is_authenticated:
+        try:
+            # Récupérer les favoris de l'utilisateur
+            user_favorites = list(Favorite.objects.filter(
+                user=request.user
+            ).values_list('product_id', flat=True))
+            user_favorites = [str(id) for id in user_favorites]
+        except Exception as e:
+            print(f"Error fetching favorites: {e}")
+            user_favorites = []
+            
     return render(request, 'home/favoris.html', {
         'favorites': favorites
     })
